items.name: Bicorne hat that is a foot deeper on the inside than it appears
items.description: A bicorne hat that is a foot deeper on the inside than it appears.

items.name: Book of long-forgotten laws, written in Old Woldish
items.description: A book of long-forgotten laws, written in Old Woldish.

items.name: Brass thimble that turns water into milk
items.description: A brass thimble that turns water into milk.

items.name: Breggle tongue, still moist
items.description: A breggle tongue, still moist.

items.name: Cherry tart pilfered from the kitchen of a fairy noble
items.description: A cherry tart pilfered from the kitchen of a fairy noble.

items.name: Cloak fashioned from a hundred voles
items.description: A cloak fashioned from a hundred voles.

items.name: Copper coin that always lands on the same side when deliberately flipped
items.description: A copper coin that always lands on the same side when deliberately flipped.

items.name: Crimson feather from an enormous bird
items.description: A crimson feather from an enormous bird.

items.name: Dead crow that never rots
items.description: A dead crow that never rots.

items.name: Deck of playing cards that shuffles itself when left unattended
items.description: A deck of playing cards that shuffles itself when left unattended.

items.name: Dried heart the size of an acorn
items.description: A dried heart the size of an acorn.

items.name: Hairball coughed up by a famous grimalkin
items.description: A hairball coughed up by a famous grimalkin.

items.name: Handkerchief stained with the kiss of Queen Abyssinia
items.description: A handkerchief stained with the kiss of Queen Abyssinia.

items.name: Heart-shaped locket with changing cat portraits
items.description: A heart-shaped locket. Each time it's opened, it contains a portrait of a different cat.

items.name: Human eye that dilates just before it rains
items.description: A human eye that dilates just before it rains.

items.name: Hundred-year-old note offering a favour in return for services rendered to a witch
items.description: A hundred-year-old note offering a favour in return for services rendered to a witch. Her descendants might be obligated to fulfil it.

items.name: Leaf from the tallest tree in Dolmenwood
items.description: A leaf from the tallest tree in Dolmenwood.

items.name: Letter begging you to aid a miller's youngest child
items.description: A letter begging you to aid a miller's youngest child.

items.name: Live cockroach tied to a thin gold string
items.description: A live cockroach tied to a thin gold string. If the cockroach is removed or killed, a new one appears in its place when the sun rises.

items.name: Lucky tortoise shell
items.description: A lucky tortoise shell.

items.name: Lute that is always out of tune in the morning and in tune in the evening
items.description: A lute that is always out of tune in the morning and in tune in the evening.

items.name: Luxurious, gold-embroidered cushion
items.description: A luxurious, gold-embroidered cushion.

items.name: Mouse skull on a string (allegedly from the moon)
items.description: A mouse skull on a string. (Allegedly, a mouse from the moon.)

items.name: Mushroom stolen from the head of a mossling
items.description: A mushroom stolen from the head of a mossling.

items.name: Nightingale's song, trapped in a locket
items.description: A nightingale's song, trapped in a locket.

items.name: Pair of boots that will never go out of fashion
items.description: A pair of boots that will never go out of fashion.

items.name: Pair of dice that always total to nine
items.description: A pair of dice that, when rolled together, always total to nine.

items.name: Pink bow that cannot turn invisible
items.description: A pink bow that cannot turn invisible under any circumstances.

items.name: Pocket watch that tells time an hour ago
items.description: A pocket watch that always tells you the correct time an hour ago.

items.name: Porcelain teacup with salamander painting
items.description: A porcelain teacup with a salamander painted on the side. Warm liquids it holds never cool down.

items.name: Rabbit's foot that sporadically twitches
items.description: A rabbit's foot that sporadically twitches.

items.name: Rat king in a sack
items.description: A rat king in a sack. Each rat inside claims to be the "King of All Rats."

items.name: Realistic mask of a human child
items.description: A realistic mask of a human child.

items.name: Scroll depicting your royal lineage
items.description: A scroll depicting your royal lineage. Of dubious authenticity.

items.name: Set of keys on a golden ring, purloined from a noble
items.description: A set of keys on a golden ring, purloined from a noble.

items.name: Severed head of a sprite, dried and preserved
items.description: A severed head of a sprite, dried and preserved.

items.name: Sewing needle, sized for a giant
items.description: A sewing needle, sized for a giant. (Treat as a dagger.)

items.name: Shard of cold iron, trapped in a glass sphere
items.description: A shard of cold iron, trapped in a glass sphere.

items.name: Single cat whisker, given as a sign of commitment
items.description: A single cat whisker, given to you as a sign of commitment.

items.name: Singular pipe, taken from a woodgrue's pan flute
items.description: A singular pipe, taken from a woodgrue's pan flute.

items.name: Small vial containing a legendarily potent strain of catnip
items.description: A small vial containing a legendarily potent strain of catnip.

items.name: Tiny bell that makes no sound
items.description: A tiny bell that makes no sound.

items.name: Trained, but not particularly smart, weasel
items.description: A trained, but not particularly smart, weasel.

items.name: Whistle that only dogs can't hear
items.description: A whistle that only dogs can't hear.

items.name: Wolf's paw that bleeds when the wolf is thinking of you
items.description: A wolf's paw that bleeds when the wolf is thinking of you.

items.name: Wooden door the shape and size of a mouse
items.description: A wooden door the shape and size of a mouse.

items.name: Eyepatch, stained with old blood
items.description: An eyepatch, stained with old blood.

items.name: Ogre's toenail, tough as steel
items.description: An ogre's toenail, tough as steel. Its owner still lives.

items.name: Eyeglasses haunted by benign ghosts
items.description: Eyeglasses haunted by benign ghosts. Wearing the glasses allows you to see them.

items.name: One of a pair of bracelets made from braided mouse tails
items.description: One of a pair of bracelets made from braided mouse tails.
